name: Magic Weapon
description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes magical and has a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.
higherLevels: When cast with a slot of 4th level or higher, the bonus increases to +2. At 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

effects.description: Weapon becomes magical and gains +1 to attack and damage rolls; bonus becomes +2 at slot 4th+ and +3 at slot 6th+.
